text: Giulietta Masina (22 February 1921 â€“ 23 March 1994) was an Italian movie and stage actress. She was born Giulia Anna Masina. She played Doris in The High Life (1960). She also played Amelia Bonetti/Ginger in the movie Ginger and Fred (1986). Masina was born in San Giorgio di Piano, Emilia-Romagna, Italy. She was married to Federico Fellini from 1943 until his death. She died in Rome from lung cancer. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Emilia- Romagna Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:1921 births Category:1994 deaths
title: Giulietta Masina
